## 

###  webpack2.0 

+ rules
+ `-loader`

```javascript
 module: {
    rules: [{
      test: /\.js$/,
      exclude: /node_modules/,
      loader: "babel-loader"
    },{
      test: /\.css$/, // Only .css files
      loader: 'style-loader!css-loader' // Run both loaders
    }]
  }
```

## bable.babelrc
+ env
+ reactjsxreact
```javascript
{
  "presets": ["env", "react"]
}
```

Post.title: ssh
Post._content:
## 
ssh 

## RSA
+ `ssh-keygen`
```bash
ssh-keygen -t rsa
```
+ 
```
Generating public/private rsa key pair.
Enter file in which to save the key (~/.ssh/id_rsa):
```

+     
```
Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase):
Enter same passphrase again:
```
+ 
  ~/.ssh/id_rsaid_rsa.pub

##   
### 
+ `ssh-copy-id`
```
ssh-copy-id -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub username@hostname.com
```
> ssh 

### 
+ id_rsa.pub
```
 scp .ssh/id_rsa.pub username@hostname.com:~
```
> scpsshssh 
+  
```
ssh username@hostname.com
```
>  
+ id_rsa.pub  .ssh/authorized_keys
```
cd ~
cat id_rsa.pub >> .ssh/authorized_keys
```

  
+ [How to Use RSA Key for SSH Authentication](http://news.softpedia.com/news/How-to-Use-RSA-Key-for-SSH-Authentication-38599.shtml)
+ [ ](https://testerhome.com/topics/8328)

Post.title: vue-a5e27b1
Post._content:
## els


```
prefix-dirname
```
prefixsd
dirnametextshowclasson


## directive



```
prefix-dirname-arg="key | filter1 | filter2.."
```
directive

```
{
  attr:,
  key:key,//key
  filters:filter,
  definition:,//dirname
  argument:arg,
  update:definitiondefinition.update //definition
}
```

## 
### 
()

### 

+ 

```
bindings[key] = binding = {
    value: undefined,
    directives: []
}
```
+ 

```
directive.el=el;
```

+ 

```
binding.directives.push(directive)
```

+ 
key-valuescopeObject.defineProperty,scope


```
function bindAccessors (seed, key, binding) {
    Object.defineProperty(seed.scope, key, {
        get: function () {
            return binding.value
        },
        set: function (value) {
            binding.value = value
            binding.directives.forEach(function (directive) {
                if (value && directive.filters) {
                    value = applyFilters(value, directive)
                }
                directive.update(
                    directive.el,
                    value,
                    directive.argument,
                    directive,
                    seed
                )
            })
        }
    })
}

```

key-valuescopeObject.defineProperty,scope


```
function bindAccessors (seed, key, binding) {
    Object.defineProperty(seed.scope, key, {
        get: function () {
            return binding.value
        },
        set: function (value) {
            binding.value = value
            binding.directives.forEach(function (directive) {
                if (value && directive.filters) {
                    value = applyFilters(value, directive)
                }
                directive.update(
                    directive.el,
                    value,
                    directive.argument,
                    directive,
                    seed
                )
            })
        }
    })
}

```

## 
vuedom[](http://v1-cn.vuejs.org/guide/components.html#)
+ $on
+ $emit
+ $dispatch()
+ $broadcast()

## 
 props down, events up

## 
+  Vue 
```
var bus = new Vue();

//  A 
bus.$emit('id-selected', 1);


//  B 
bus.$on('id-selected', function (id) {
  // ...
})

```
+ [](https://cn.vuejs.org/v2/guide/state-management.html)

Post.title: webpack
Post._content:
## 
webpackcssJavaScript

## 

+ 
```
require("!style!css!./style.css") //style.css
```

+ 
```
webpack entry.js  bundle.js --module-bind 'css=style!css'
```

+ 

```
module.exports = {
  entry: './entry.js',
  output: {
    path: __dirname,
    filename: 'bundle.js'
  },
  module: {
    loaders: [
      {test: /\.css$/, loader: 'style!css'}
    ]
  } 
}
```

## 
```
webpack --progress --colors
```

## 

```
webpack --watch
```

## 
+ 
```
npm install webpack-dev-server -g
```
+ 
```
webpack-dev-server
```
